text: This is a good theme, this game has lots of great music. I enjoyed playing it though I've taken an unintended long break from the game. I'm partial to the autumn music because I just love how calming and wistful they are.

text: Great choice. The soundtrack to this game is very fitting. The songs for the summer are up beat and exciting. The winter songs are ambient and filled with reflection. Great game to just relax and pass the time.

author: darkshade2k7

text: After such a busy week, the week-end is extremely appreciated! I'll take the time to relax, enjoy the nice weather and play some video games. I still have to watch the latest Game of Thrones episode as well. Stardew Valley is a huge success and reinvigorated the farm-sim genre by reaching a wider audience than even its inspiration, the Harvest Moon series. A Steam release + social media always helps. The whole game was made by Eric Barone, including the nice soundtrack. I really like this feel-good theme and I couldn't be happier that summer will soon be upon us... my favorite season!
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky How close are you to finishing up Xenoblade Chronicles?
author: Eric C.

text: +Eric C. (slamdunkgators) I believe I'm quite close to finishing it. I just got to the Bionis Interior (for the 2nd time) after doing tons of sidequests. I should be done with it in the upcoming days/weeks.
author: SupraDarky
